text:
I used a servlet that create a session , and forward to another servlet , in 
the second I get the same session number as usual,But if I try to forward to 
the third servlet , I loose  the session , the session will be null , if I try 
request.getSession(false); if I forward to a jsp page I get a new session 
number .

thanx
creator: bettache@excite.com
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Please include a sample, and try this with 3.3. Many bugs were fixed, including 
few similar ones. If you still have the problem, we need some simple code to
reproduce it.
